Use G-OnRamp via Virtual Machine¶

Requirements¶

  1. Download and install Virtual Box => https://www.virtualbox.org/
  2. Download our G-OnRamp image

Step by step installation¶

Credentials: - Login: gonramp - Password: gonramp

Credentials inside Galaxy: - Login: gonramp@email.com - Password: gonramp

Modifying Galaxy (updates or customizations)¶

Go to ~/Dev/galaxy folder, and you can start from there.

You can read more documentations on github.

Modifying HubArchiveCreator¶

Go to ~/Dev/hub-archive-creator folder, and you can start.
